content:
Hi guys,

Just had a conf. call with IHE-Netherlands and one of the topics raised was the MedMij initiative. Do you know if there's any contact with IHE about MedMij? If not, does it make sense to include them?

Cheers!
melle

Hi. Yes that makes sense. They have been asked and informed on multiple occasions, but have not sent anyone thusfar. We have sent out notice of the invitation again yesterday to the IHE NL secretarial office. The notion that they are not invited is a misunderstanding and we do not understand how that came to be.
Alexander, thanks for the prompt response. I'll follow up with Tie Tjee and refute any allegations they make in the future ;-). Cheers!
Thanks. Please tell Tie Tjee we would love to have IHE at the table. MedMij is inclusive for everyone with an interest.
Should I ask Fred Smeele to extend IHE any future invitations or can I leave this with you?
We have just received word that Tie Tjee, Evert Sanderse and Onno Gabel will join us. I think we're covered this time. Thanks though.
